question: In the reaction between hydrogen sulphide and acidified permanganate solution,
choices: H2S is reduced to S, MnO4- is oxidised to Mn2+
H2S is oxidised to SO2, MnO4- is reduced to MnO2
H2S is reduced to SO2, MnO4- is oxidised to Mn2+
H2S is oxidised to S, MnO4- is reduced to Mn2+
explanation: H2S is oxidised to Sulphur (S) and MnO4- is reduced to Mn2+ [cite: 559-567].
